verses.verse: Behold <S%H3117><s%>, a day of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>, when thy spoil <S%H7998><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> in the midst of thee <S%H7130><s%>.

For I will gather <S%H622><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>; and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be taken <S%H3920><s%>, and the houses <S%H1004><s%> rifled <S%H8155><s%>, and the women <S%H802><s%> ravished <S%H7901><s%>; and half <S%H2677><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>, and the residue <S%H3499><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> shall not be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Then shall Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%>, and fight <S%H3898><s%> against those nations <S%H1471><s%>, as when <S%H3117><s%> he fought <S%H3898><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H7128><s%>.

And his feet <S%H7272><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> upon the mount <S%H2022><s%> of Olives <S%H2132><s%>, which is before <S%H6440><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%>; and the mount <S%H2022><s%> of Olives <S%H2132><s%> shall be cleft <S%H1234><s%> in the midst <S%H2677><s%> thereof toward the east <S%H4217><s%> and toward the west <S%H3220><s%>, and there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> valley <S%H1516><s%>; and half <S%H2677><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall remove <S%H4185><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of it toward the south <S%H5045><s%>.

And ye shall flee <S%H5127><s%> by the valley <S%H1516><s%> of my mountains <S%H2022><s%>; for the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall reach <S%H5060><s%> unto Azel <S%H682><s%>; yea <S%H5127><s%>, ye shall flee, like as ye fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the earthquake <S%H7494><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>; and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>, and all the holy ones with thee <S%H6918><s%>.
And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that there shall not be light <S%H216><s%>; the bright <S%H3368><s%> ones shall withdraw themselves <S%H7087><s%>:

but it shall be one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> which is known <S%H3045><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; not day <S%H3117><s%>, and not night <S%H3915><s%>; but it shall come to pass <S%H6153><s%>, that at evening time <S%H6256><s%> there shall be light <S%H216><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that living <S%H2416><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; half <S%H2677><s%> of them toward the eastern <S%H6931><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of them toward the western <S%H314><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>: in summer <S%H7019><s%> and in winter shall it be <S%H2779><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall be King <S%H4428><s%> over all the earth <S%H776><s%>: in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be one <S%H259><s%>, and his name <S%H8034><s%> one <S%H259><s%>.

All the land <S%H776><s%> shall be made like the Arabah <S%H6160><s%>, from Geba <S%H1387><s%> to Rimmon <S%H7417><s%> south <S%H5045><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; and she shall be lifted up <S%H7213><s%>, and shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in her place <S%H4725><s%>, from Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>'s gate <S%H8179><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, unto the corner <S%H6434><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, and from the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hananel <S%H2606><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>'s wine-presses <S%H3342><s%>.
And men shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H2764><s%>, and there shall be no more curse; but Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>.

And this shall be the plague <S%H4046><s%> wherewith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5062><s%> all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> that have warred <S%H6633><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: their flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall consume away <S%H4743><s%> while they stand <S%H5975><s%> upon their feet <S%H7272><s%>, and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall consume away <S%H4743><s%> in their sockets <S%H2356><s%>, and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall consume away <S%H4743><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that a great <S%H7227><s%> tumult <S%H4103><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall be among them <S%H2388><s%>; and they shall lay hold every one <S%H376><s%> on the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall rise up <S%H5927><s%> against the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> also shall fight <S%H3898><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; and the wealth <S%H2428><s%> of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> shall be gathered together <S%H622><s%>, gold <S%H2091><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%>, and apparel <S%H899><s%>, in great <S%H3966><s%> abundance <S%H7230><s%>.

And so shall be the plague <S%H4046><s%> of the horse <S%H5483><s%>, of the mule <S%H6505><s%>, of the camel <S%H1581><s%>, and of the ass <S%H2543><s%>, and of all the beasts <S%H929><s%> that shall be in those <S%H1992><s%> camps <S%H4264><s%>, as that plague <S%H4046><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H3498><s%>, that every one that is left of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> against Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall go up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H1767><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> to year <S%H8141><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, and to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H4940><s%>, that whoso of all the families of the earth <S%H776><s%> goeth not up <S%H5927><s%> unto Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, upon them there shall be no rain <S%H1653><s%>.

And if the family <S%H4940><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> go not up <S%H5927><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> not <S%H4046><s%>, neither shall it be upon them; there shall be the plague wherewith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5062><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> that go not up <S%H5927><s%> to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>.

This shall be the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that go not up <S%H5927><s%> to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be upon the bells <S%H4698><s%> of the horses <S%H5483><s%>, HOLY <S%H6944><s%> UNTO JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%>; and the pots <S%H5518><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> shall be like the bowls <S%H4219><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

Yea <S%H5518><s%>, every pot in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and in Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; and all they that sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> of them <S%H1310><s%>, and boil therein <S%H3117><s%>: and in that day there shall be no more a Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
